lead_paragraph: Prices for chateaus in the Loire Valley and the neighboring Mayenne department have stabilized after the global economic crisis of 2008, agents said.
snippet: Prices for chateaus in the Loire Valley and the neighboring Mayenne department have stabilized after the global economic crisis of 2008, agents said....
abstract: International House Hunting column; 1850s Renaissance Revival chateau in Mayenne department of northwest France is listed at $1,860,000; information about market and tips for buying properties in France highlighted.
